tgt_original: 云何？ 頌曰： 所說沙門性，　　亦名婆羅門，

src_original: brahmacakraṃ tu brahmavartanād iti.
tgt_original: 亦名為梵輪，　　真梵所轉故。

src_original: tasmāt brahmacakram iti.  anuttarabrāhmaṇyayogād iti.
tgt_original: 即此亦說名為梵輪，是真梵王力所轉故。

src_original: anuttarānāsravamārgayogād ity arthaḥ.  eṣa hi bhagavān brāhmety etad udāharaṇaṃ jīvakenoktam etat.
tgt_original: 佛與無上梵德相應，是故世尊獨應名梵。 由契經說佛亦名梵、亦名寂靜、亦名清涼。 即於此中唯依見道，世尊有處說名法輪。

src_original: āśugatvādyarādibhir  iti.  āśugatvādibhir arādibhiś cety arthaḥ.  āśugatvād iti vistaraḥ.  idaṃ mārgasya cakraratnena sādharmyam ucyate.
tgt_original: 如世間輪有速等相，見道似彼故名法輪。 見道如何與彼相似？ 由速行等似彼輪故。

src_original: evaṃ [Tib.254b] cetanādharmādayo 'pi yojyāḥ.
tgt_original: 如是思等如理應思。

src_original: yo yasminn eva guṇe sthitaḥ.  tasmād ananurakṣann api na kaṃpyate.  sa sthitākaṃpyaḥ.  yaḥ pareṇa pratividhyati.  guṇaviśeṣam utpādayatīty arthaḥ.  sa prativedhanābhavyaḥ.  yo na kupyati utpannebhyo na parihīyate.  so 'kopyadharmā.
tgt_original: 非練根得名為不退，練根所得名為不動。 此二所起殊勝等至，設遇退緣亦無退理。

src_original: ko viśeṣa iti.  aparihāṇadharmādīnāṃ trayāṇām aparihāṇiyogād viśeṣam apaśyan praśnayati.  anuttāpanāgata iti.  svabhāvatas tīkṣṇendriyaḥ.  neṃdriyottāpanāṃ prāpta ity arthaḥ.
tgt_original: 安住法者，但於已住諸勝德中能無退失，不能更引餘勝德生，設復引生從彼可退。

src_original: tasmān na kaṃpyata iti.  tasmāt guṇaviśeṣād ity arthaḥ.
tgt_original: 是不退等三種差別。

src_original: kāyajīvitanirapekṣatvāt kāraṇān maraṇakāla evārhattvaṃ prāptaḥ.  śastrādhārād uttarakāla ity arthaḥ.  [Tib.255a] parinirvṛttaś ca tenaiva śastraprahāreṇa.  daśottare ceti.  daśottaranāmasūtre.
tgt_original: 由於身命無所戀惜，臨命終時得阿羅漢便般涅槃，故喬底迦亦非退失阿羅漢果。

src_original: eko dharmaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ.  katama ity āha.  akopyā cetovimuktir iti.  arhattvam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
tgt_original: 一法應起，謂時愛心解脫。

src_original: pṛthagvacanād dhy akopyavimuktilakṣaṇād arhattvād arhattvasvabhāvā na kāṃtā cetovimuktir uktety abhiprāyaḥ.  dviprakāratvād arhattvasya pṛthagvacanam iti vaibhāṣikavacanāvakāśaṃ paśyan punar āha.  yady arhattvam eva sāmayikī kāṃtā cetovimuktir abhaviṣyat.  kim arthaṃ tatraiva daśake na sūtrāṃtare arhattvasya dvigrahaṇam akariṣyat.  eko dharmaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ.
tgt_original: 一法應證，謂不動心解脫。

src_original: akopyā cetovimuktir iti.  naivākariṣyad ity arthaḥ.  evaṃ hy avakṣyat.  eko dharmaḥ sākṣātkartavyaś cetovimuktir iti.  brūyās tv arhattvaṃ dviprakāram.
tgt_original: 若應果性名為時愛心解脫者，何故於此增十經中再說應果？

src_original: ato vacanavibhāgenocyate.  ekam utpādayitavyaṃ dvitīyaṃ sākṣātkartavyam iti.  atra brūmaḥ.  na ca kvacid arhattvam utpādayitavyam uktaṃ.  [Tib.255b] kiṃ tarhi.  sākṣātkartavyam iti.  tatratatra sūtre.
tgt_original: 又曾無處說阿羅漢果名為應起，但說名應證。

src_original: abhyupetyāpi brūmaḥ.  mṛdvindriyasaṃgṛhītaṃ cotpādayitavyam iti.  kim anena jñāpanena jñāpitaṃ kathitaṃ bhavati.  yadi tāvad utpādayituṃ śakyam ity etaj jñāpitaṃ bhavati.  (Abhidh-k-vy 591) śaki liṅ ceti kṛtyapratyayalakṣaṇāt.  anyad api śakyaṃ yat tīkṣṇendriyasaṃgṛhītam arhattvaṃ.  tathā ca saty evaṃ sūtre vaktavyaṃ syāt.
tgt_original: 又說鈍根所攝應果名為應起，為顯何義？

src_original: kathaṃ.  yadi kāyavāksaṃvaramātraṃ.  (Abhidh-k-vy 667) kathaṃ tadabhāve tatsaṃvaro bhaviṣyati.
tgt_original: 若彼唯有身語律儀。 身語既無，律儀寧有？

src_original: na cāsati bhūte bhautikaṃ yujyate.
tgt_original: 又無大種，何有造色？

src_original: anāsravasaṃvaravac cet.
tgt_original: 若謂如有無漏律儀。

src_original: na.  sāsravabhūtasadbhāvād iti.  sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramād iti vacanāt.  samāpattāv api tatpratiṣedha ukta ity apare.  tad evaṃ nārūpyasamāpattiṣu nārūpyopapattiṣu rūpam astīti darśitaṃ bhavati.
tgt_original: 不爾，無漏依有漏大種故，又彼定中亦遮有故。

src_original: parimāṇālpatvāc cet.  atha mataṃ.  paramāṇumātraṃ rūpam asti.  atas ta īṣadrūpā iṣyanta iti.  udakajaṃtukeṣv apy aṇutvād adṛśyarūpeṣu prasaṃgaḥ ārūpyaprasaṃga ity arthaḥ.
tgt_original: 若許於彼有色根身，如何可言彼色微少？

src_original: acchatāc cet.  tatraitad syād rūpasyācchatvād ārūpyā iti.  antarābhavarūpāvacareṣv apu prasaṃgaḥ.  antarābhavarūpāvacarā hi vajramayeṣv api parvateṣv acchatvād asajjamānā [Tib.333a] gacchaṃti.  teṣv ārūpyaprasaṃgaḥ.  samāpattivat tadupapattiviśeṣād iti.
tgt_original: 若謂於彼身量小故，水細蟲極微亦應名無色，亦身量小不可見故。

src_original: eṣa saṃbhavo dhyānopapattirūpasyāpi cādharabhūmikenendriyeṇāgrahaṇaṃ.  kathaṃ.  prathamadhyānabhūmikenendriyeṇa dvitīyabhūmikasyāgrahaṇaṃ.  evaṃ yāvat tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikenendriyeṇa caturthadhyānabhūmikasya rūpasyāgrahaṇaṃ.  ūrdhvabhūmikasyācchataratamatvāt.
tgt_original: 若謂彼身清妙中極，應唯有頂得無色名。

src_original: tad evaṃ dhyānopapattirūpasya cādharabhūmikenendriyeṇāgrahaṇāt kas tatra viśeṣaḥ.  ārūpyadhātau yad acchataratamābhyāṃ sāmānye 'pi ta evārūpyā iṣyaṃgte na rūpāvacarāḥ.  tasmān na tatra rūpaṃ.  atha mataṃ dvayor dhātvor anvarthā saṃjñā.  kāmaguṇaprabhāvitaḥ kāmadhātuḥ.
tgt_original: 如定生身有勝劣故，又生靜慮所有色身非下地根所能取故，與彼何異不名無色？

src_original: rūpaprabhāvito rūpadhātur iti.  nārūpyadhātor [Tib.333b] anvarthā saṃjñā.  kiṃ tarhi yādṛcchikī ti.  dvayor dhātvor anvarthā saṃjñā.
tgt_original: 若謂欲色隨義立名，無色不然。

src_original: yadi hi tac caitasikaṃ syāt kathaṃ tat kāyena pratisaṃvedyet.  manaḥ kāyeneti.  manaḥ samudāyenaivam uktvā.  ko guṇa iti.  sukhaṃ ca manasā pratisaṃvedayati.
tgt_original: 若謂於此說意為身，此說身名為有何德？

src_original: caturthe dhyāne praśrabdhibhūyastve 'pi sukhāvacanāc ceti.  caturthe dhyāne praśrabdhisukhaṃ bhūyo bhavati bahutaraṃ bhavati.  dhyānāntarebhyaś caturthasya praśrabdhataratvāt.  tadbhūyastve [Tib.340a] 'pi sukhasyāvacanaṃ.  caturthe dhyāne sukhaṃ nocyate.
tgt_original: 又第四定輕安倍增，而不說彼有樂支故。

src_original: tasya sukhasyāvacanāt.  vedanāsukham eva tat tṛtīye dhyāne gamyate.  na caturthe sukhā vedanāstīti tatra nocyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.  sukhavedanānukūlā praśrabdhiḥ sukham iti cet.  syān mataṃ.
tgt_original: 若謂輕安要順樂受方名為樂，第三靜慮輕安順樂應是樂支。

src_original: tatra praśrabdhisukhaṃ kasmān noktaṃ.  vedanāsukham eva hi tatra bhavadbhir vyavasthāpitaṃ.  na praśrabdhiḥ sukhaṃ.  dviḥsukhapāṭhāt.  upekṣopahatatvād iti cet.
tgt_original: 不爾，行捨增輕安故。

src_original: syān mataṃ.  tṛtīye dhyāna upekṣā karmaṇyatālakṣaṇā bhavati.  tayopahatā praśrabdhir iti nocyate iti.  na.  upekṣayaiva (Abhidh-k-vy 674) tadvṛddheḥ.
tgt_original: 又彼輕安勝前二故。

src_original: pūrvikābhyāṃ hi prathamadvitīyadhyānapraśrabdhibhyāṃ.  [Tib.340b] tṛtīyadhyānapraśrabdhir viśiṣṭā.  pūrvikābhyāṃ dhyānābhyāṃ tṛtīyasya viśiṣṭatvāt.  yasmin samaya iti vistaraḥ.  yasmin samaye āryaśrāvakaḥ pravivekajāṃ prītiṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharati.  paṃcāsya dharmās tasmin samaye prahīyante.  paṃca dharmā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchanti.
tgt_original: 若於爾時諸聖弟子於離生喜身作證具足住，彼於爾時已斷五法，修習五法皆得圓滿，廣說乃至何等名為所修五法？

src_original: adhyātmasaṃprasādaḥ prītiḥ praśrabdhiḥ sukhaṃ [prajñā] samādhiś ceti.
tgt_original: 一歡、二喜、三輕安、四樂、五三摩地。

src_original: praśrabdhisukhayor ananyatve katham eṣāṃ paṃcatvaṃ syāt.  arthāntaratve ca sati kāyikam eva sukhaṃ triṣv api dhyāneṣv iti siddhaṃ bhavati.
tgt_original: 此經輕安與樂別說，故初二樂非即輕安。

src_original: vāyur bījam uktam iti.  bahuvidhaprabhāvabhinnair vāyubhir abhimathyamānā iti vacanāt.
tgt_original: 或此即以前災頂風為緣、引生風為種子。

src_original: samāpannasya kathaṃ kāyavijñānam iti.  atrocyate.

src_original: samādhiviśeṣajena praśrabdhināmnā sukhavedanīyena sukhavedanānukūlena vāyunā kāyaspharaṇāt kāyadhmāpanāt.  kiṃ.
tgt_original: 有亦無失，許在定中有輕安風勝定所起，順生樂受遍觸身故。

src_original: evam apīti.  yady apy āhriyante bījāni na te sthūlabhāvānāṃ bījādibhyo bījāṃkuragaṇḍādibhyo 'ṃkurādīnām aṃkurakāṇḍādīnām utpattim icchanti.  bījādīni hi teṣāṃ nimittakāraṇāni na samavāyikāraṇāni.  samavāyikāraṇaiś ca bhavitavyaṃ.  ata āha.
tgt_original: 雖爾，不許芽等生時是種等因親所引起。

src_original: kiṃ tarhi.  svebhya evāvayavebhya iti vistaraḥ.  tadyathāṃkurādyavayavī aṃkurādyavayavebhyaḥ.

src_original: teṣām api aṃkurādyavayavānāṃ svebhya evāvayavebhyaḥ.  teṣām api svebhya eveti evaṃ yāvat paramāṇubhyaḥ.
tgt_original: 如是自分復從自分，展轉乃至最細有分從極微生。

src_original: anyatra paramāṇūpasarpaṇād iti.  na janane bījādīnāṃ sāmarthyaṃ kiṃcid asti.  aṃkurādiparamāṇūpasarpaṇāt tu teṣāṃ sāmarthyam iṣyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
tgt_original: 於芽等生中，種等有何力？ 除能引集芽等極微，種等更無生芽等力。

src_original: yat tūktaṃ sarvam eva rāgasaṃyuktaṃ cittaṃ sarāgam iti.
tgt_original: 前說一切貪所繫心皆名有貪心。

src_original: [Tib.288a] rāgālaṃbanaṃ cet.  atha mataṃ rāgasya yad ālaṃbanaṃ.  tad rāgasaṃyuktaṃ sarāgaṃ ca bhavati.  arhato 'pi sāsravaṃ cittaṃ parakīyasya rāgasyālaṃbanatvāt rāgasaṃyuktam iti kṛtvā sarāgam iti gṛhṇīyāt paracittavit paracittajñānaṃ vā.
tgt_original: 若貪得隨故，有學無漏心應名有貪，貪得隨故。 若貪所緣故，無學有漏心應名有貪，貪所緣故。

src_original: atha mataṃ na tad rāgeṇālaṃbyata iti.  tata ucyate.  kathaṃ vā tat sāsravam iti.
tgt_original: 若不許彼為貪所緣，云何彼心可成有漏？

src_original: sāmānyakleśālaṃbanatvād iti cet.  atha mataṃ sāmānyakleśānāṃ dṛṣṭivicikitsāvidyānām ālaṃbaṇaṃ tad ataḥ sāsravam iti.  evam api samohaṃ grḥṇīyāt.  arhataḥ sāsravaṃ cittaṃ mohālaṃbanatvāt.  moho 'pi sāmānyakleśaḥ.
tgt_original: 若謂由為共相惑緣應名有癡，癡所緣故。

src_original: parakīyasya ca mohasyārhaccittam ālaṃbanībhavatīti.  na ca paracittajñānaṃ prāptyālaṃbanam iti.
tgt_original: 然他心智不緣貪得，亦不可說緣緣心貪。

src_original: yasmāt paracittajñānaṃ cittacaittālaṃbanam iṣyate.
tgt_original: 寧知他心是有貪等？

src_original: tasmān na rāgapraptisahitatvena rāgasaṃyuktatvāt sarāgam iti.  nāpi taccitālaṃbanarāgālaṃbanam iti.  tad iti yat tat parakīyaṃ cittaṃ paracittajñānena [Tib.288b] gṛhyate.  tat tacchabdenocyate.
tgt_original: 故非貪繫名有貪心。

src_original: raktam idaṃ eittaṃ jānātīti vacanāc ca.  tasmād api na rāgasaṃyogāt sarāgaṃ cittam iti.  asaṃprayuktaṃ vigatarāgam iti.
tgt_original: 今詳經意，貪相應故名有貪心，貪不相應名離貪等。

src_original: kāyavijñānaṃ bhavaty eveti.  bahirvikṣepāt samādhibhraṃśa iti cet.  yadi manyeta kāyvijñānotpattyā bahirvikṣepād bāhyaviṣayavikṣepāt samādhibhraṃśa iti.  na.
tgt_original: 若謂外散故應失壞定者，無如是失，此輕安風從勝定生，引內身樂還能順起三摩地故。

src_original: kasmāt.  samādhijasyāṃtaḥkāyasaṃbhūtasyābahirjabhūtasyety arthaḥ.  kāyasukhasya kāyavijñānasaṃprayuktasya veditasukhasya samādhyanukūlatvān nāsmāt samādhibhraṃśa ity arthaḥ.  na.
tgt_original: 若謂依止欲界身根不應得生色界觸識，緣輕安識，許生無過。

src_original: tadyathā nādasya kāraṇaṃ ghaṇṭeti ghaṇṭā rautīty ucyate.  tadvat.
tgt_original: 如世間說鍾鼓能鳴，或如燈能行，識能了亦爾。

src_original: sa deśāntareṣūtpadyamānaḥ saṃtānarūpaḥ pradīpadeśāntareṣūtpadyamānaḥ.  taṃtaṃ deśaṃ gacchatīty ucyate.
tgt_original: 焰相續中假立燈號，燈於異處相續生時說為燈行，無別行者。

src_original: evaṃ cittānāṃ saṃtāne vijñānam ity upacaryate.  ekam iveti kṛtvā.  tat saṃtānarūpaṃ vijñānaṃ viṣayāntareṣūtpadyamānaṃ taṃtaṃ viṣayaṃ vijānātīty ucyate.  saṃtānena vijñānotpattyā vijānātīty abhiprāyaḥ.
tgt_original: 如是心相續假立識名，於異境生時說名能了。

src_original: yathā vā rūpaṃ bhavatīti vistaraḥ.  yathā bhavitū rūpasya bhāvāj janitur jāteḥ sthātuḥ sthiter anarthāntaratvam.
tgt_original: 或如色有色生色住，此中無別有生住者。

src_original: evaṃ vijñāne 'pi syāt.
tgt_original: 說識能了，理亦應然。

src_original: saṃdhāyoktaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 624) na saṃprayogam iti darśayaty anāvartikadharmi kāmabhave rūpabhave ārūpyabhave iti.  traidhātukavairāgyasaṃdarśanād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
tgt_original: 離貪瞋癡心，不還墮三有。 依離得說，故無有過。

src_original: vijñātur vijñānasya bhāvād anarthāntaratvaṃ.  vyatiriktasya bhāvasyānupalabdheḥ.  vaiśeṣikasūtrānusārād vā.  nātmana iti.  yadi nātmano vijñānam utpadyate vijñānalakṣaṇasyāviśeṣāt tādṛśam eva vijñānam utpadyeta.  yadi tv ātmanaḥ tasyābhiprāyaviśeṣād viśiṣṭaṃ jñānam utpadyetety abhiprāyaḥ.
tgt_original: 若後識生，從識非我。

src_original: nanu coktam iti vistaraḥ.  kvoktam.
tgt_original: 豈不於前已破此說？

src_original: aṃkurakāṇḍapattrādivad iti.  aṃkurāt kāṇḍa evotpadyate [Tib.378b] na pattrādi.  kāṇḍāt pattram evotpadyate na puṣpādy aṃkurādi vā.  tadvat.
tgt_original: 不恒似前，及不定次生，如芽莖葉等，有為皆有住異相故。

src_original: nikāmadhyānasamāhitānām iti.  nikāmena paryāptena samāptena dhyānena samāhitānām.  sadṛśakāyacittotpattau sadṛśasya kāyasya cittasya cotpattau.  na paropakrameṇety abhiprāyaḥ.  evam anena kasmān na nityaṃ sadṛśam evotpadyata ity yat pṛṣṭaṃ.
tgt_original: 謂諸有為自性法爾，微細相續後必異前。 若異此者，縱意入定，身心相續相似而生，後念與初無差別故，不應最後念自然從定出。

src_original: tad visarjanaṃ.  yat tu pṛṣṭaṃ na ca kramaniyameneti.  tad darśayann āha.  kramo 'pi hi cittānām niyatam eveti.  abhīṣṭam evaitat.  gotraviśeṣād iti bhāvanāviśeṣāt.
tgt_original: 諸心相續亦有定次，若此心次彼心應生，於此心後彼必生故。 亦有少分行相等心方能相生，種性別故。

src_original: strīcittād iti vistaraḥ.  strīcittāt stryālambanāc cittād anantaraṃ tasyāḥ striyāḥ kāyas tatkāyaḥ.  tatkāyasya vidūsāṇāyai yadi parivrājakasyānyasya vā sādhoś cittam utpannaṃ bhavati.  tatpatiputrādicittaṃ vā.  tasyāḥ patiputrādayaḥ.
tgt_original: 如女心無間起嚴污身心，或起彼夫彼子心等。

src_original: ādiśabdena duhitrādayo gṛhyante.  tadālambanaṃ cittaṃ tatpatiputrādicittaṃ.  tad vānyatarad yad idaṃ tasmāt strīcittād anantam utpannaṃ bhavati.  punaś ca kālāntareṇa saṃtatipariṇāmena strīcittam utpadyate.  tat paścād utpannaṃ strīcittaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 714) samarthaṃ bhavati tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittotpādane tatstrīkāyavidūṣaṇācittotpādane tatpatiputrādicittotpādane vā samarthaṃ.  kasmād ity [Tib.379a] āha.
tgt_original: 後時從此諸心相續轉變差別還生女心。

src_original: tadgotratvād iti.  tadkāyavidūsaṇācittaṃ tatpatiputrādicittaṃ vā gotraṃ bījam asyeti tadgotraṃ.  cittaṃ tasya bhāvaḥ.  tasmāt.  tajjātīyatvād ity abhiprāyaḥ.  anyathety atadgotraṃ.
tgt_original: 如是女心於後所起嚴污心等有生功能，異此無功能，由種性別故。

src_original: atra tu sūtra iti vistareṇa yāvad yadi hi rāgeṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ vigatarāgaṃ syād anyakleśasaṃprayuktam [Tib.289a] api vigatarāgaṃ syād ity  etenābhisaṃdhinā rāyaviprayuktatvād vigatarāgam anyakleśasaṃprayuktam apīty anena.
tgt_original: 餘惑相應者，應得離貪名，彼亦與貪不相應故。 若依此意，許亦無違。

src_original: yady evaṃ sadveṣaṃ samoham ity evamādi.  na vaktavyaṃ syād ity ata āha.  na tu tad vigatarāgam ityādi.
tgt_original: 然不說為離貪心者，彼屬有瞋有癡等故。 且止傍論，應述本宗。

src_original: yady asmin vastuni rūpādike raktam iti vijānīyāt tad rūpālaṃbanam api syāt.
tgt_original: 不爾，他心智應亦緣色等，又亦應有能自緣失。

src_original: svapakṣo hi vātsīputrīyo nikāya iti.
tgt_original: 然犢子部執有補特伽羅，其體與蘊不一不異。

src_original: atha punaḥ paryāyeṇeti vistaraḥ.  paryāyeṇāyugapat.  strīcittāt tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittaṃ tatas tatpaticittaṃ tatas tatputracittaṃ tata eva ca tadduhitṛcittaṃ tata eva ca tadupakaraṇādicittaṃ utpannaṃ  tataḥ strīcittād anaṃtarotpannebhyaś cittebhyo yad bahutaraṃ pravāhataḥ paṭutaraṃ śaktitaḥ āsannataraṃ vāsyotpādyasya cittasya.  tad eva cittam utpadyate.
tgt_original: 女心無間容起多心，然多心中若先數起、明了近起，先起非餘。

src_original: tadbhāvanāyā balīyastvāt tasya bahutarasya paṭutarasyāsannatarasya vā bhāvanāyā balavattaratvāt.  anyatreti vistaraḥ.  tatkālapratyupasthitas tatkālikaḥ kāyapratyayaviśeṣo bāhyapratyayaviśeṣaś ca.  tasmād anyatra tasmād ṛta ity arthaḥ.  tad eva hy upapadyate yasya kāyo bāhyo vā pratyayaviṣaya uptiṣṭhate.
tgt_original: 由如是心修力強故，唯除將起位身外緣差別。

src_original: saiva balīyasīti.  yā bahutarasya paṭutarasya āsannatarasya vābhihitā saiva balīyasi bhāvanā.  kasmān nityaṃ na phalati na hi tac cittaṃ nivartate.  vartata itītareṇa codita āha.
tgt_original: 諸有修力最強盛者，寧不恒時生於自果？

src_original: sthityanyathātvalakṣaṇatvāt.  [Tib.379b] sthiter anyathātvaṃ lakṣaṇam asyeti sthityanyathātvalakṣaṇaṃ.  tadbhāvāt.  tasya cānyathātvasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇasya.  anyabhāvanāphalotpattau anyabhāvanāphalasya cittāntarasyotpattāv ānuguṇyān nityaṃ na phalati tad evety arthasaṃbandhaḥ.
tgt_original: 由此心有住異相故，此住異相於別修果相續生中最隨順故。

src_original: evaṃ hy āhur iti sthavirarāhulaḥ.  sarvākāram  iti sarvaprakāraṃ.  mayūracandrakasya  varṇasaṃniveśādiprakārāḥ.  kāraṇam
tgt_original: 諸心品類次第相生因緣方隅我已略說，委悉了達唯在世尊，一切法中智自在故。

src_original: na jñeyaṃ  na jñātuṃ śakyaṃ.  asarvajñaiḥ  śrāvakapratyekabuddhādibhiḥ.  sarvajñabalaṃ hi tat jñānaṃ  sarvavidbalaṃ hi taj jñānaṃ.
tgt_original: 於一孔雀輪，　　一切種因相， 非餘智境界，　　唯一切智知。

src_original: vicāryaṃ tāvad etad iti.
tgt_original: 此應思擇，為實為假。

src_original: [Tib.364b] bhinnalakṣaṇaṃ rūpaṃ śabdād ityādi.
tgt_original: 別有事物是實有相，如色聲等。

src_original: kṣīrādivat samudāyaś cet prajñaptitaḥ.  yathā kṣīragṛhasenādikaṃ rūparasagaṃdhaspraṣṭavyebhyaḥ.  tṛṇakāṣṭheṣṭīkādibhyaḥ hastyaśvarathādibhyaś ca na bhāvāntaram iṣyate.  teṣām eva samudāyamātram ity evaṃ cet.  prajñaptitaḥ pudgala ity upagato bhavati.  na hi rūpādibhyas ṭṛṇādibhyo hastyādibhyo vā kṣīragṛhaseneti vā kaścid bhāvo 'sti.
tgt_original: 但有聚集是假有相，如乳酪等。

src_original: yathā rūpādiskandhād vedanāskandho 'nyo bhinnalakṣaṇatvāt.  evaṃ skaṃdhebhyaḥ pudgalaḥ syāt.  arūpaskandhādilakṣaṇatvāt pudgalasya.
tgt_original: 體若是實應與蘊異，有別性故，如別別蘊。

src_original: kāraṇaṃ cāsya vaktavyaṃ.  yadi saṃskṛta ity abhiprāyaḥ.  asaṃskṛto vā.  atas tīrthikadṛṣṭiprasaṃgaḥ.  ato 'saṃkṛtatvāt vātsīputrīyāṇāṃ tīrthikadṛṣṭiḥ prasajyate.
tgt_original: 又有實體必應有因，或應是無為，便同外道見。

src_original: yena tat kāraṇaṃ jñāyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.  prāg (Abhidh-k-vy 715) evarūpiṇāṃ cittabhedānām iti.  rūpakāraṇam api sarvathā jñātum aśakyaṃ kim arūpiṇām ity arthaḥ.
tgt_original: 色差別因尚為難了，況心心所諸無色法因緣差別可易了知？

src_original: ekīyas tīrthika iti vaiśeṣikaḥ.  manaḥsaṃyogaviśeṣāpekṣatvād iti cet.  syān mataṃ tulye 'py ātmaprabhavatve cittotpatter ātmā kadācit karhicin manaḥsaṃyogaviśeṣam apekṣate.
tgt_original: 一類外道作如是執，諸心生時皆從於我。 前之二難於彼最切。

src_original: ity ato na nityaṃ tādṛśam eva cittam utpadyate na ca kramaniyamenāṃkurakāṇḍapattrādivad iti.
tgt_original: 若諸心生皆從我者，何緣後識不恒似前，及不定次生，如芽莖葉等。

src_original: bhāvāntaraṃ na veti tuviśeṣaḥ.  tasmāc cittād eva saṃskāraviśeṣāpekṣād buddhiviśeṣo 'stu.  kim ātmanā tatsaṃyogena vā kalpiteneti.  na hi kiṃcid iti vistaraḥ.  kuhakenaikatareṇa vaidyena kasmaicit glānāyauṣadhaṃ dadānena cintitaṃ.
tgt_original: 若待行別，我意合者，則應但心待行差別能生異識，何用我為？

src_original: niḥprayojanatvaṃ ceti.
tgt_original: 又應無用，徒執實有。

src_original: iti cintayitvā tad abhimaṃtrya phūḥ svāhā phūḥ svāheti janasya darśitam.  anena mantreṇedam auṣadhaṃ sidhyatīti.  tatra yathā kuhakavaidyaphūḥsvāhānām auṣadhakāryasiddhau sāmarthyaṃ nāsti.  auṣadhasyaiva tu sāmarthyam.  evam ātmano buddhiviśeṣopattau nāsti sāmarthyaṃ.  cittasyaiva sāmarthyam iti.
tgt_original: 如藥事成能除痼疾，誑醫矯說普莎訶言。

src_original: saty ātmani tayoḥ saṃbhava iti cet.  syān mataṃ.  ity ato 'sty ātmeti.  atra brūmo vāṅmātraṃ.  nātra kācid yuktir astīti.
tgt_original: 若謂此二由我故有，此但有言，無理為證。

src_original: āśrayaḥ sa iti cet.  syān matam.  ātmāśrayas tayor iti.  yathā kaḥ kasyāśraya iti.  āśrayarūpeṇodāharaṇaṃ mṛgyate.
tgt_original: 若謂此二我為所依，如誰與誰為所依義？

src_original: tam asyāśrayārtham ayuktaṃ darśayann āha.  na hi te [Tib.381b] iti vistaraḥ.  te saṃskāracitte.  citrabadarādivat.  yathā kuḍye citram ādhāryaṃ badaraṃ ca kuṇḍe.  ādiśabdena bhājane bhojanam ityādi.  naiva te saṃskāracitte tatrātmany ādheye.
tgt_original: 非心與行如畫如果，我為能持如壁如器，如是便有更相礙失，及有或時別住失故。

src_original: nāpi sa kuḍyakuṇḍādivad ādhāro yuktaḥ.
tgt_original: 非如壁器，我為彼依。

src_original: evam eteṣām api syāt.  aniṣṭaṃ caitat.  ato 'nātmāśrayaḥ.
tgt_original: 彼如是言，證成無我，故我於此深生喜慰。

src_original: yathā na gandhādhibhyo 'nyā pṛthivī.  tathā buddhyādibhyo 'nya ātmeti.
tgt_original: 如世間地不離香等，我亦應爾，非離心行。

src_original: (Abhidh-k-vy 717) ko hi satpuruṣo gaṃdhādibhyo 'nyāṃ pṛthivīṃ nidhārayati.
tgt_original: 誰能了地離於香等？

src_original: idam andhavaṃcanam anunmīlitārtham iti.
tgt_original: 如是謬言，於義未顯。

src_original: yathā rūpādīn gṛhītvāpekṣya kṣīraprajñaptiḥ.  na rūpādivyatiriktaṃ kṣīram astīti.  yadi tathā pudgala iti prajñaptir asatpudgalaḥ prāpnotīty arthaḥ.  skaṃdhān pratītyeti.  yadi skaṃdhān pratītya prāpyeti.
tgt_original: 若攬諸蘊是此依義，既攬諸蘊成補特伽羅，則補特伽羅應成假有，如乳酪等攬色等成。

src_original: iti siddhāntāt.  bhinnakālatvād iti.  pūrvam indhanaṃ paścād agniḥ.
tgt_original: 若依此理火則異薪，後火前薪時各別故。

src_original: bhinnakālayoś cānyatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bījāṃkurayoḥ.  anityaś ca prāpnotīti.  utpattimato rūpāder anityatvadarśanāt.  tatraiva kāṣṭhādau pradīpta iti.  tadubhayalakṣaṇe samudāye.
tgt_original: 若汝所計補特伽羅，如火依薪依諸蘊者，則定應說緣蘊而生，體異諸蘊，成無常住。 若謂即於炎熾木等煖觸名火，餘事名薪，是則火薪俱時而起，應成異體，相有異故。

src_original: na hi pṛthivī katamety ukte rūpagandharasasparśebhyo 'nyā darśayituṃ śakyate yathā rūpaṃ gandhādibhyo 'nyad iti.  yadi na gaṃdhādibhyo 'nyā pṛthivī.  katham ayaṃ vyapadeśaḥ pṛthivyāṃ gandhādaya iti.  anyena hy anyasya vyapadeśo dṛṣṭaḥ.  caitrasya kambala iti.
tgt_original: 但於香等聚集差別，世俗流布立以地名。

src_original: ata ucyate.  vyapadeśas tu iti vistaraḥ.  [Tib.382a] viśeṣaṇārthaṃ ity abādibhyo viśeṣaṇārtham ity arthaḥ.  katham iti pratipādyati.  te hy eveti vistaraḥ.
tgt_original: 我亦應然，但於心等諸蘊差別，假立我名。

src_original: te hy evety evakāras tadvytiriktapṛthivīdravyanivṛttyarthaḥ.  te eva gandhādayaḥ.  tadākhyāḥ pṛthivyākhyāḥ.  yathā vijñāyeran.  tathā viśeṣaṇārthaṃ vyapadeśa ity abhisaṃbandhaḥ.
tgt_original: 若離香等無別有地，如何說言地有香等？

src_original: nānya iti.  nābādyākhyāḥ.  pṛthivyākhyebhyo 'nye vijñāyerann ity arthaḥ.  kāṣṭhapratimāyāḥ śarīravyapadeśavad iti.  yathā kāṣṭhapratimāyāḥ śarīram iti vyapadiśyate.
tgt_original: 為顯地體有香等別，故即於地說有香等，令他了達是此非餘，如世間言木像身等。

src_original: yo hi baliṣṭha iti.  saṃskāraviśeṣaḥ.  tenānyeṣāṃ saṃskāraviśeṣāṇāṃ pratibandhaḥ.
tgt_original: 若時此行功用最強，此能遮餘令不生果。

src_original: sa eva baliṣṭhaḥ kasmān nityaṃ na phalatīty ācāryavacanaṃ.
tgt_original: 寧從強者果不恒生？

src_original: sa eva punar āha.  yo 'sya nyāyo yaḥ saṃskārasya nyāyo vināśaḥ pratibandho vā.  so 'stu bhāvanāyā bījātmikāyāḥ.
tgt_original: 答此如前修力道理，許行非常漸變異故。

src_original: ātmā tu nirarthako niḥprayojanaḥ kalpyate.  saṃskārārthā hi tatkalpanā syāt.  tasya ca saṃskārasya yat kāryaṃ.  tad bhāvanayaiva kriyata iti.  smṛtyādīnām iti vistaraḥ.  syān mataṃ.
tgt_original: 若爾，計我則為唐捐，行力令心差別生故。

src_original: smṛtisaṃskārecchādveṣādīnāṃ [Tib.382b] guṇapadārthatvāt tasya ca guṇapadārthasyāvaśyadravyāśritatvād dravyāśrayaś ca guṇavān ity evaṃ lakṣaṇopadeśāt.  na caiṣām anya āśrayaḥ pṛthvyādiko yujyate 'parapratyakṣatvādhibhiḥ.  kāraṇaiḥ.  ato ya eṣām āśrayaḥ.  sa ātmā.  tasmād asty ātmeti.
tgt_original: 彼行此修體無異故，必定應信我體實有，以有念等德句義故，德必依止實句義故，念等依餘理不成故。

src_original: smṛtyādīnāṃ guṇapadārthatvāsiddheḥ.
tgt_original: 謂說念等德句義攝體皆非實，義不極成，許有別體皆名實故。

src_original: rūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ durbalā cittasaṃtatir avibhūtarūpasaṃjñatvād vinā rūpeṇa na vartate.  tato rūpaṃ niśritya vartate.
tgt_original: 有色界生此二劣故。

src_original: tasyāḥ kena balavattvam iti.  tasyā ārūpyāvacaryāḥ kena kāraṇena balavattvam.  ata āha.
tgt_original: 無色此二因何故強？

src_original: samāpattiviśeṣajatvād iti vistaraḥ.  vibhūtarūpasaṃjñeti.  vigatarūpasaṃjñety arthaḥ.
tgt_original: 彼界二從勝定生故，由彼等至能伏色想。

src_original: atas tajjā ārūpyā cittasaṃtatir api rūpanirapekṣā pravartate.  tata eva tarhi balavattvāt samāpattiviśeṣajanitatvāt pravartiṣyate.  kiṃcid aniśrityety abhiprāyaḥ.
tgt_original: 若爾，於彼心等相續，但依勝定，何用別依？

src_original: yathā rūpiṇām iti vistaraḥ.  yathā rūpiṇāṃ rūpaniśrite nikāyasabhāgajīvitendriye.  evam arūpiṇāṃ kiṃ niśrite iti vākyārthaḥ.
tgt_original: 又今應說，如有色界受生有情同分命根依色而轉，無色此二以何為依？

src_original: tad etat dvayam anyonyam iti.
tgt_original: 此二更互相依而轉。

src_original: kim arthaṃ na tad eva dvayam anyonyam iti.  kiṃ rūpaniśrayeṇeti abhiprāyaḥ.
tgt_original: 有色此二何不相依？

src_original: tatredānīm iti.  [Tib.245b] tatrārūpyadhātau kena balavattvaṃ tayor nikāyasabhāgajīvitendriyayoḥ.
tgt_original: 有色界生此二劣故。 無色此二因何故強？

src_original: tad etac cittasaṃtatau samānam iti.  asāv api cittasaṃtatiḥ samāpattiviśeṣāj jātā bhavatīti na dvayaṃ niśritya pravartiṣyati.  anāśritaiva pravartiṣyata iti.
tgt_original: 彼界此二種，從勝定生故。 前說彼定能伏色想，是則還同心相續難。

src_original: cittacaitteṣu vā samānam iti prakṛtaṃ.  kiṃ punaḥ samānaṃ anyonyaniśrayatvaṃ.
tgt_original: 或心心所唯互相依，故經部師說無色界心等相續無別有依。

src_original: vajravālakavad iti.  vajreṇa pratisaṃyukto vālako 'ṅgulīyakaḥ kaṭako vā vajravālakaḥ.  maricapānakavac ca.  yathā maricaiḥ pratisaṃyuktaṃ pānakaṃ maricapānakaṃ.  madhyapadalopāt.
tgt_original: 欲所屬界說名欲界，色所屬界說名色界，略去中言故作是說，如胡椒飲如金剛環。

src_original: [Tib.246a] rūpaṇīyo veti.  bādhanīya ity arthaḥ.
tgt_original: 所言色者，是變礙義，或示現義。

src_original: rūpayogāc ca sa śakyate bādhituṃ.  tadbhāva ārūpyam iti.
tgt_original: 彼體非色立無色名，非彼但用色無為體。

src_original: yadā dhātūttarapadam etad bhavati.  tadārūpyadhātur iti yujyate.  yadā tu niruttarapada ārūpyaśabdaprayogaḥ.  tadyathā atikramya rūpāṇy ārūpyā iti.  tadā ārūpā evārūpyā iti svārthe taddhitāt parigrahaḥ kāryaḥ.  ārūpye vā sādhava ārūpyā iti paśyāmi.  kāmānāṃ vā dhātur iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsenaiva sādhayati vināpi pratisaṃyuktaśabdalopena.
tgt_original: 無色所屬界，說名無色界，略去中言，喻如前說。

src_original: kaś cāsau kāmānāṃ dhātur ity āha.  kāmān yo dadhātīti.
tgt_original: 又欲之界名為欲界，此界力能任持欲故。

tgt_original: 餘法具二，是故能招，如貞實種、水所沃潤。

tgt_original: 若謂前生正見等為後生正見等支，則初剎那聖道等應不具有八支等。

tgt_original: 一能學一分、二能學少分、三能學多分、四能學滿分？

tgt_original: 身入法性、成熟、解脫，三位亦爾。 傳說如是順解脫分唯聞思所成，通三業為體。

src_original: atha vānādimati saṃsāre strīpuruṣā anyonyaṃ rūpābhirāmāḥ.  te ca vedanāsvādagardhāt.  tadgardhaḥ saṃjñāviparyāsāt.
tgt_original: 或從無始生死已來，男女於色更相愛樂，此由耽著樂受味故，耽受復因倒想生故，此倒想生由煩惱故，如是煩惱依識而生。

src_original: tadviparyāsaḥ kleśaiḥ.  cittaṃ ca tatsaṃkliṣṭam iti yathāsaṃkleśaṃ krama iti dvitīyaṃ.

src_original: dhātuto vā kāmarūpaprabhāvito hi kāmadhātuḥ.
